    • setGardenParameters

      public void setGardenParameters​(String moistureType, String soilType, String sunType, String budget)
      Sets the garden parameter values in the model.
      Parameters:
      moistureType - moisture value to set in garden.
      soilType - soil value to set in garden.
      sunType - sun value to set in garden.
      budget - budget value to set in garden.

    • exportGarden

      public void exportGarden​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane btnPrint, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane btnReturn)
      Sets the event handling for buttons on the exportGarden scene
      Parameters:
      stage - The stage of the JavaFX application
      printBtn - Exports the drawPane (garden polygon + plants) to a PDF
      rtnBtn - Sends the user to the gardenScene

    • motivationHoverListeners

      public void motivationHoverListeners​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pane, javafx.scene.image.ImageView backGround, javafx.scene.text.Text titleText, javafx.scene.text.Text moreInfo, javafx.scene.layout.HBox infoText)
      Set up hover listeners for the motivation screen.
      Parameters:
      pane - StackPane over which users will hover to see motivation info.
      infoRect - Rectangle which contains the motivation information.
      titleText - Text that is displayed when user is not hovering.
      moreInfo - Text that is displayed when user is hovering.
